trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the hobgoblin is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hobgoblin makes four attacks, each of which can be an Unarmed Strike or a Dart attack. It can also use
Shadow Jaunt once, either before or after one of the attacks.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Dart
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shadow Jaunt
entries: The hobgoblin teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. Both the space it leaves and its destination must be in dim light or darkness.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The hobgoblin casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 12}):
